fig.label: Figure 7.8

caption.p: Visualization of the complexity of mutant spectra (haplotype composition) of five isolates of WNV denoted by c, d, e, f, and g (magenta bars) that have identical consensus sequence. The color lines connect the genomes where the same single nucleotide change occurs. Similarly, color-coded ribbons indicate that the same mutation occurs in two genomes in the same position. Nucleotide positions are numbered next to the outer rim of the circle.

fig.attrib: Figure reproduced from Kortenhoeven et al. (2015). BMC Genomics is an open-access journal, and the article can be reproduced under the terms of the Creative Commons Attribution. The figure has been reproduced with the permission of the authors.
